data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: There have been a lot of attacks on people's computers in recent news. People ____ spread ____ viruses ____ take ____ of one's computer, and won't release ____ data ____ that ____ until ____ has ____ a ____. Lots of people agree to pay rather than lose all their files and information.
data.partBlankContent: There have been a lot of attacks on people's computers in recent news. People c__ spread comp____ viruses th__ take con____ of one's computer, and won't release t__ data o_ that comp____ until o__ has pa__ a ran___. Lots of people agree to pay rather than lose all their files and information.
data.fullContent: There have been a lot of attacks on people's computers in recent news. People can spread computer viruses that take control of one's computer, and won't release the data of that computer until one has paid a ransom. Lots of people agree to pay rather than lose all their files and information.
data.answer: 在最近的新闻中，人们的电脑受到了很多攻击。人们可以传播电脑病毒，控制自己的电脑，直到有人付了赎金才会释放电脑上的数据。很多人同意付钱，而不是丢失他们所有的文件和信息。
